meanings.definition: To deface public property with graffiti.
meanings.sent1: The mischievous kids graffitied the park benches with colorful drawings.
meanings.sent2: The vandals graffitied the abandoned building with their tags.
meanings.sent3: The prankster graffitied the teacher's whiteboard with funny doodles.
meanings.sent4: His mind was graffitied with memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The city walls were graffitied with messages of hope and unity.

meanings.sent1: The old train car was graffitied with vibrant street art.
meanings.sent2: The alleyway was graffitied with various tags and symbols.
meanings.sent3: The classroom desk looked graffitied with doodles of aliens and spaceships.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook was graffitied with lyrics and quotes that inspired her.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned warehouse was graffitied with intricate designs and colors.
